Yashas Katte

From Imagination to Digital Reality

2002

He was born in 2002 (probably in the spring) in Shivamogga, a town in Karnataka, in India. His father Raghavendra, His mother Bharathi, adevout and strong-willed woman, raised him and his sister.

2005

He strugled understanding superstious beliefs that wrong the use of his dominant hand. First enrolled in a school in Banglore, In 2005, His school disregraded him as "special" as he was a slow learner! His farther took a great interest in supporting his son and help in fight against the predijuce of his school

2011

In 20011, His family shifted to Mumbai, Yashas experienced a new fast world. Gusling with people, He joined ICSC school, Where he learnt, How to make friends, That everyone is special!

2012

In 2012, His Father suprised him with a laptop, At the age of 10, Yashas started transporting his imagnation to the digital World

2015

In 2015, He joined another school, He learnt is intrest in science, Experinced school as normies did, Had friends, created chaos etc. During these days, He learnt true life teachings.

2016

In a late evening of 2015, Yashas started enriching Nitrous Oxide with is new "safe" chemistry kit. Turning his house in into inflamable and toxic environment, He soon realised that he was a genius!

2018

On March 2018, Yashas sought pursue computer science as his major. Made his first intreaction with his passion, To code. He learnt that transportation of his imagination is more effective using programing languages, thus created his first voice assitant embded into the dusty old laptop.

2020

After a lot of strugle and predujuce of a pandemic, Yashas got into a college of Engneering, Yearning to meet people like him, Although it started remote. He had no idea what was going befall!

2021

Disapointed in seeing people alike him, He joined Team AutoZ. It opened up to his people, People who think like him. Thus he soon reliased that robotics is best effective way of transportation!

2023

With help of his well wishers, Yashas particpated in a lot of projects, internships. He built autonmous drones, Cars, iot products. Thus started his carreer in transporting his imagnation to the digital world with the use of robotics!

Source/Yas
